Meta.title: Robert Strobl | Software Engineering with Business Focus
Meta.description: Software Engineering with a Business-First Mindset

About.title: Building Tech Ventures. From Berlin.
About.p1_1: With over 20 years of experience as a
About.p1_2: , I bring a wealth of knowledge and proven insights to help ambitious digital ventures scale, innovate, and succeed.
About.p2: Throughout my career, I've built 50+ digital products with global remote teams. I also founded and led a 30-person development consultancy in Malaysia, which was acquired in 2023.

Services.title: Software Engineering with Business Focus
Services.p: As a software engineer and entrepreneur, I understand that technology decisions are business decisions. I optimize development processes, select practical tech stacks, and ensure engineering aligns with scalability and growth.
Services.product_dev_p: From concept to launch, I guide you through the full product lifecycle. Whether building from scratch or enhancing existing solutions, I ensure scalable, high-performing, and user-centric products.
Services.tech_audit_p1: Assess and optimize your software development processes, code quality, and team performance.
Services.tech_audit_p2: I provide in-depth technical audits and best-practice recommendations to enhance efficiency and maintainability.
Services.digital_strategy_p1: Align technology with business goals through structured requirements and strategic planning.
Services.digital_strategy_p2: I help define clear technical roadmaps, ensuring your digital initiatives are well-architected and built for success.
Services.ai_p: Develop and optimize AI models tailored to your industry needs. From domain-specific machine learning solutions to data strategy and implementation, I help you leverage AI to drive automation, decision-making, and innovation.

Clients.title: Trusted by Leading Brands
Clients.p: I’ve had the privilege of working with a diverse range of clients, from early-stage startups to established enterprises. Here are a few of the brands I’ve collaborated with.

Contact.title: Let's Build Something Great Together
Contact.p: Whether you’re launching a new venture, scaling an existing product, or seeking technical guidance, I’m here to help. Let’s connect and discuss how we can collaborate to achieve your goals.
Contact.thanks_p: Your message has been sent. I'll get back to you shortly.
Contact.name: Your Name
